resources.string: Sorry, but the calendar cannot be displayed right now
Turn sound on when there is a reminder notification
First day of the week in the calendar - Monday\n(otherwise it\'s Sunday)
My diary is an application that will help you keep your memories save and a few clicks away.\nHere are some tips:
In the home screen you can swipe left or right to record notes/reminders or see the calender
If you don\'t have internet you can use the offline mode - this enables you to use the reminder functionality only.
If writing is too troublesome for you then use google\'s speech recognition. It will write for you!
Afraid someone might read your notes? Not a problem - put a password only you know on your darkest secrets.
Too much stuff to remember? Make a reminder and manage all your reminders easily.
Save your notes with us. The only thing you\'ll need is our app and for you to login to see them later.
Easily manage your notes with our calendar. If you have internet and are logged in the days for which you have notes will be marked with green
If you want to delete a note or a reminder just long press it.
Not all the available options are in the action bar - press the menu button on your phone for more.
